entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.2°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning this evening and ending overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High zero.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 06 January 2023
